title: just wanted to say how fair riot are.
body: so i was misinformed and told the Kayle and Morgana skins are gonna be on the shop until March 22nd by the support. today i got some rp to get the skin i wanted for kayle and saw the skins aren't there. i contacted the support and they told me because i was misinformed they will give me the skin i wanted for the rp. ty riot,
